summary: New Dwemer / Dvarwen Weapons. non Replacer!
descriptionHtml:
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[color=brown][center][size=+3][font=Times New Roman]- DWARVEN AXES -
- ZWERGENÄXTE -[/font][/size][/center][/color]


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[img]http://i.imgur.com/Q7Zvs.jpg[/img]



[u][color=brown][center][size=+1][font=Times New Roman]GERMAN[/font][/size][/center][/color][/u]


----------------------
[color=yellow][b]Beschreibung:[/b][/color]
----------------------

Die Axt ist als Einhand, Einhand aus Gold und Zweihand version verfügbar.
Der schmieden-Level deines Characters muss mindestens 30- und das Zwergisch Perk freigeschlatet sein.
Die erforderlichen Rohmaterialien sind Stahl, Zwergen Metall, und Gold- Barren.
Um eine goldene Axt schmieden zu können muss erstmal eine Normale gebaut werden.


------------------------
[color=yellow][b]Waffennamen:[/b][/color]
------------------------

- Zwergische Einhandaxt
- Zwergische Einhandaxt aus Gold
- Zwergische Zweihandaxt


-------------------
[color=yellow][b]Credits:[/b][/color]
-------------------

vielen Dank an [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/6247421]dptheslothking[/url] für seine [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64647/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D64647%26preview%3D&pUp=1]A Lot of Dual Sheath Redux Patches[/url] Mod, die auch die Zwergen Äxte unterstützt sowie mein [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23085/?]Mithrodin Sword[/url]
KrimeMinister vom [url=http://www.mypandur.com/modforum/index.php]mypandur.com[/url] modforum für die Texturen!
Nexus Präsenz von [url=http://newvegas.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1103327]KrimeMinister[/url]
Danke an: [url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3880534]XolodHarver[/url] für die Übersetzung in's [url=http://www.modgames.net/load/248-1-0-9994]Russische[/url]


-------------------
[color=yellow][b]Installation:[/b][/color]
-------------------

- den Data Ordner ins Skyrim-Verzeichnis entpacken
- Skyrim launcher Starten, auf "Dateien" klicken, den Haken bei der esp aktivieren und Spielen!



---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[img]http://i.imgur.com/eM9pT.jpg[/img]



[u][color=brown][center][size=+1][font=Times New Roman]ENGLISH[/font][/size][/center][/color][/u]


-------------------
[color=yellow][b]Description:[/b][/color]
------------------

the weapon is available in three different versions.
a one-handed, one-handed golden and a heavy two-handed axe.
make sure the smithing level of your character is on 30 and the dwarven smithing perk is activated.
requires the raw materials steel- dwarven metal- and gold ingots.
before you can smithing a golden one, first you have to build a normal one-handed axe.


------------------------
[color=yellow][b]Weapon names:[/b][/color]
------------------------

- Dwarvish Axe
- Dwarvish Axe golden
- Dwarvish heavy Axe


-------------------
[color=yellow][b]Credits:[/b][/color]
-------------------

many thanks to [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/6247421]dptheslothking[/url] for the [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/64647/?tab=1&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmoddescription%2F%3Fid%3D64647%26preview%3D&pUp=1]A Lot of Dual Sheath Redux Patches[/url] Mod, which supports the Dwarven Axes and also my [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23085/?]Mithrodin Sword[/url]
KrimeMinister from the [url=http://www.mypandur.com/modforum/index.php]mypandur.com[/url] for the textures!
Nexus presence from [url=http://newvegas.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=1103327]KrimeMinister[/url]
Thanks to: [url=http://www.skyrim.nexusmods.com/modules/members/index.php?id=3880534]XolodHarver[/url] for the Translation to [url=http://www.modgames.net/load/248-1-0-9994]Russian[/url]


-------------------
[color=yellow][b]Installation:[/b][/color]
-------------------

- extract the data folder into your Skyrim directory
- start the skyrim launcher, click on files and make a checkmark at the esp and run the game!





---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
author: Blutkult
